feed.title: june’s blog
feed.subtitle: June's thoughts, ramblings and other musings.

entry.title: hello world
entry.content: I couldn't think of a cornier way to start this first post. This is what 2 braincells at 12:42 in the morning accomplishes and yes I am proud of myself. To simply put it in illustrate, I feel like a cross between: **and** Besides, being delirious never hurt anyone. The **important** thing today is that it marks a new era. The beginning of this blog. Or maybe the end of me as we know it. We'll see. Stay tuned.
entry.summary: I couldn’t think of a cornier way to start this first post. This is what 2 braincells at 12:42 in the morning accomplishes and yes I am proud of myself.
